meanings.definition: The act or process of containerising.
meanings.sent1: The containerisations of goods at the port were done efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The containerisations of products for shipping is essential for safe transport.
meanings.sent3: The containerisations of the toys made them look like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a containerisations of memories, each item holding a special moment.
meanings.sent5: The containerisations of the ingredients in the recipe made cooking easier.

meanings.sent1: The containerisations of the cargo were neatly stacked in the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The containerisations of the items in the storage unit made it easy to find things.
meanings.sent3: The containerisations of the books on the shelf created a sense of order.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a containerisations of thoughts, each one neatly organized.
meanings.sent5: The containerisations of the files in the cabinet made it simple to locate documents.
